SELECT * FROM NET_MEMBER A WHERE A.MB_DELYN ='Y'
AND A.MB_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.MB_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

SELECT A.MB_NUM MB_NUM ,A.MB_ID MB_ID ,A.MB_NAME MB_NAME ,A.MB_GENDER MB_GENDER ,A.MB_PHOTO MB_PHOTO ,A.MB_LIKING MB_LIKING ,TO_CHAR(A.MB_INSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MB_INSDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.MB_UPDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MB_UPDDATE FROM NET_MEMBER A WHERE A.MB_DELYN='Y' AND A.MB_NUM = #{mb_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
